settings.content: After enabling Wishlist you will need to install the free install [ wishlist & compare app](http://apps.arenatheme.com/install)

settings.label: Languages you wish to translate
settings.info: Input Google Translate language code seprate by spacing. E.g EN, JA, KO, RU, TH. [Language code list](https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/directory/v1/languages)

settings.content: Make your website multilingual. Translation API that integrates seamlessly into your website and delivers it in any languages. [Register Here](https://weglot.com/)

settings.label: Destination languages
settings.info: Choose languages you want to translate into. Supported languages can be found [here](https://weglot.com/documentation/available-languages).

settings.label: Disabled default Ajax Search suggestion
settings.info: Disable Ajax search to integration with Searchanise app. [Register app with 30% discount](http://www.searchanise.com/get/arenacommerce)

settings.label: Searchanise API Key
settings.info: It used to optimize Speed CSS delivery. [How to get search api key](https://www.arenacommerce.com/blogs/news/how-to-get-searchanise-api-key)

settings.label: Currency Switcher by Geo IP Location

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. [Click here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](https://docs.shopify.com/support/settings/general/tell-my-script-where-to-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Use background image instead of color
Background image
settings.info: The width of image is 1920 pixel. Only for template are customers or page. For other templates, please upload in Sections

settings.info: Turn on to disable ability to buy products

settings.info: For best results [all product photos should be the same ratio](https://help.shopify.com/manual/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).

settings.info: For best results [all product photos should be the same ratio](https://help.shopify.com/manual/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).

settings.label: Default Product Template:
settings.info: Select a default template for each product. Alternate templates can also be used for invidual pages. [Learn more](https://help.arenacommerce.com/customization/product.html)

settings.content: Input product [Variants option name](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/variants/add-variants) separate seperate by comma corresponding to the type of swatches
If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.
Fomo Popups display real-time customer activity notifications on your store. You can use it as a Social Proof Markteting Tool to Boost Conversions
